metadata.title: CVE-2024-47094 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File in Checkmk GmbH's Checkmkversions <2.3.0p22, <2.2.0p37, <2.1.0p50 (EOL) causes remote site secretsto be written to web log files accessible to local site users.

criterions.comment: check-mk package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
